AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Noldor elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up in a time of relative peace but still at odds of war with the mountain roaming Goblins and Orcs, NAME spent HIS childhood practicing combat and crafting while studying during HIS leisure time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Teleri elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Living at the shores during HIS younger days, NAME helped out with delivering resources to the shipwrights and learned the basics of ship-making.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sindar elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Keeping to HIMself just like HIS kin, NAME spent HIS childhood studying books of ages past. Having no real connection to the outside world past HIS kin, NAME wasn’t open to new faces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Falmari elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME grew up being taught the ways of art and song. The tales of HIS people within the artistry had always kindled a great curiosity in HIS heart. HE would often venture out into the nearby forests seeking a glimpse of the doings of the world outside the safety of the lands of HIS kin.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nandor elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up in the forest, NAME spent HIS time tending to the deer herds and tree groves, shut away from the outside world. HE knew little of the doings of those that lived beyond the wooden lands of HIS kin but fostered great knowledge and kinship with the workings of the natural world around HIM.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME stalked the forests and plains, killing from afar anyone who trespassed on HIS lord’s land. HECAP learned how to be quick on HIS feet and stealthy with HIS tactics to catch intruders and dispense justice with impunity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME decided that HE was going to take up arms under HIS lord’s name. HECAP sought to test himself against stronger and stronger foes wherever he could find them. In doing so, HECAP became so revered for HIS abilities in combat that HE eventually became exceedingly proud and conceited.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME loved the heat of the forge, the striking song of precious metals ringing under hammers, and the joy of creation. HECAP became a renowned smith among HIS people and wished only for more designs and metals with which to work his craft.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent decades cooking while living on HIS own. HIS culinary skills bringing HIM great comfort and satisfaction until one day he decided to share his passion. Eventually, HIS finest meals became widely celebrated by those fortunate enough to taste them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf poet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As HE came of age, NAME grew quite fond of the art of weaving words. HE strove to become an orator of renown. HIS charismatic command of language led HIM to be widely sought after, not just for poems, but for the comfort of HIS company and HIS skillful negotiations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf musician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having much fondness for the soft sounds of elven instruments and the kind of lyrics of HIS peoples songs, NAME seeks to keep the elven memories alive through meter and note, tone and pitch, and the sound of soothing strings and silver harps.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf shipwright
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Knowing well enough the legends of HIS people, NAME made it his life's work to build and design sailing ships worthy of HIS lord's favor and aspires to become the master builder of the vessel which will spirit away his kin on the great journey.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf kinslayer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After HE was discovered murdering HIS kin, NAME was exiled by HIS brothers and sisters. HECAP vowed revenge, and took to finding, hunting down, and killing HIS siblings. When HIS mission was complete, HE wandered the forests in search of more folk, kin or no kin, all would fail to stop HIM.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Taking great interest in the deep history and methodology of Elven architecture, NAME spent decades studying how to perform feats of engineering that seemed impossible to the other peoples of the world. HECAP soon became adept at shaping the world around HIM, without destroying it, and HE became an expert Elven architect.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Yavinildi elf-maiden
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is one of the Yavinildi. HECAP is a Maiden of Yavanna, charged with preparing lembas, the elven waybread, by using the lembas crops from the fields. This sacred duty is one HE takes very seriously, and the thought of anything attempting to spoil the purity of HIS work is one that instantly raises NAME's alarm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a master of the healing arts, and people came from all around in search of HIS care, whether for the mending of the flesh, simple tonics, salves, and tinctures, or treatment of more serious debilitating diseases. It is even rumored that HE could, with but a touch, restore health to one’s heart and snatch away the aches in one’s limbs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf herbalist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent the summer of their lives healing others through nature’s bounties. Some herbs worked better than others, and through countless years of trial and error coupled with the wisdom of HIS elders, HE became a herbalist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf lord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: For when the strength of MEN fails, an elf-lord stands ready. NAME attained the position after decades of serfice and the tragic loss of HIS lord. At the behest of HIS kin, HE arose as the ruler who would guide HIS people for centuries to come.
